select uid,uname,pid,type_id,type_name,detail_type,title,simple_text,content,cover_img,href,tag,create_time,read_times,like_times,comments_times,favorites from item_details where type_id=#{type_id} and detail_type=#{articleType} order by create_time desc LIMIT 0,24
